descriptor.name: Poultry Farming Training (Gujarat) Enrollment Specialist
descriptor.short_desc: Learn to assist Gujarat's weaker sections in applying for a government-stipended poultry farming training program.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module details the 'Stipend Scheme for Poultry Farming Training for Weaker Section' by the Gujarat Government. Agents will learn how to guide applicants from weaker sections through the process of enrolling in scientific poultry training, securing a stipend, and receiving certification.

  1. Stipend & Benefits:
    Understand the financial assistance structure, including the maximum â‚¹2000 stipend for the six-day training. This covers a daily allowance and transport fare, paid directly to the beneficiary's bank account.
  2. Application Process:
    Master the online application steps on the I-Khedut Portal, from new application and updates to the final printout and submission of documents. Emphasize the mandatory physical or scanned copy submission.
  3. Eligibility & Prioritization:
    Learn the eligibility criteria, focusing on adults from economically weaker sections in Gujarat. Understand the prioritization given to female and Below Poverty Line (BPL) applicants.

Why Take This Course:

  • Empower individuals from weaker sections with skills for income generation.
  • Specialize in a state-level scheme that promotes scientific farming and economic upliftment.
  • Become a vital resource for your community, facilitating access to valuable training and government aid.

descriptor.name: Gujarat Agri-Training & Welfare Department
descriptor.short_desc: Focused on providing training and welfare schemes for agricultural advancement in Gujarat.
descriptor.long_desc: Our department is committed to raising the income of farmers and weaker sections by providing access to scientific training and financial support through initiatives like the I-Khedut portal.
